items.content_html: All this time I’ve figured that you just can’t use SwiftUI PreviewProviders if your view takes a Binding ‚Äî but I’m glad to find out I’m wrong! You can pass a Binding.constant value into your PreviewProvider. https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swiftui/binding/constant(_:)
items.content_text:
All this time I've figured that you just can't use SwiftUI PreviewProviders if your view takes a Binding ‚Äî but I'm glad to find out I'm wrong! You can pass a `Binding.constant` value into your PreviewProvider.
https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swiftui/binding/constant(_:)
